resources.string: Point the camera lens towards the vehicle. If the system screen reader is turned on, touch the center of the screen to find out the recognized line number. You can also find information about the recognized line at the bottom of the screen.
Narrowing down the vehicle type criterion improves the accuracy of line number recognition.
To recognize a vehicle the app requires a camera. Without it the app will not be able to recognize the vehicle at all. Do you want to try again?
